#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
char a[1001];
int i;
scanf("%s",a);
for(i=0;a[i];i++)
{
if(a[i]=='w')
printf("q");
else if(a[i]=='e')
printf("w");
else if(a[i]=='r')
printf("e");
else if(a[i]=='t')
printf("r");
else if(a[i]=='y')
printf("t");
else if(a[i]=='u')
printf("y");
else if(a[i]=='i')
printf("u");
else if(a[i]=='o')
printf("i");
else if(a[i]=='p')
printf("o");
else if(a[i]=='s')
printf("a");
else if(a[i]=='d')
printf("s");
else if(a[i]=='f')
printf("d");
else if(a[i]=='g')
printf("f");
else if(a[i]=='h')
printf("g");
else if(a[i]=='j')
printf("h");
else if(a[i]=='k')
printf("j");
else if(a[i]=='l')
printf("k");
else if(a[i]=='x')
printf("z");
else if(a[i]=='c')
printf("x");
else if(a[i]=='v')
printf("c");
else if(a[i]=='b')
printf("v");
else if(a[i]=='n')
printf("b");
else if(a[i]=='m')
printf("n");
if(a[i]=='W')
printf("Q");
else if(a[i]=='E')
printf("W");
else if(a[i]=='R')
printf("E");
else if(a[i]=='T')
printf("R");
else if(a[i]=='Y')
printf("T");
else if(a[i]=='U')
printf("Y");
else if(a[i]=='I')
printf("U");
else if(a[i]=='O')
printf("I");
else if(a[i]=='P')
printf("O");
else if(a[i]=='S')
printf("A");
else if(a[i]=='D')
printf("S");
else if(a[i]=='F')
printf("D");
else if(a[i]=='G')
printf("F");
else if(a[i]=='H')
printf("G");
else if(a[i]=='J')
printf("H");
else if(a[i]=='K')
printf("J");
else if(a[i]=='L')
printf("K");
else if(a[i]=='X')
printf("Z");
else if(a[i]=='C')
printf("X");
else if(a[i]=='V')
printf("C");
else if(a[i]=='B')
printf("V");
else if(a[i]=='N')
printf("B");
else if(a[i]=='M')
printf("N");
}
return 0;
}
